title: Unsinkable hull alloy has a severe iceberg sensitivity
description: Temporary workaround - avoid crashing into icebergs until vulnerability is patched.

title: Message of initial advertising campaign 'very unlikely to sink' not strong enough.
description: Fate unlikely to be tempted. Update: Now resolved.

title: Iconic song not catchy enough.
description: People who haven't seen the film in decades should still randomly get it stuck in their heads from time to time.

title: Jalopey in cargo hold is potential hanky-panky hotspot for starcrossed teenage protagonists.
description: Perhaps start locking the car and/or cargo hold
